TEXT_DICT.This: Contains pairs of Strings, used to get values based on keys.

TEXT: When playing as The Defier, #yConfusion muddles cards between #b0–2 Energy instead of #b0–3 Energy.

The Defier starts with only 1 Energy. Many cards have alternate costs, such as gaining #yVulnerable or taking damage via cards with the #yReckless tag. Be prepared to take a lot of damage, and turn your deficiencies into strengths. Taking lots of damage adds #yCurses to your deck, so be careful about flooding your deck with them, though they can have their upsides.
The Defier starts with only 1 Energy. Many cards have alternate costs, such as gaining #yVulnerable or taking damage via cards with the #yReckless tag
Building up #yLion's #yHeart allows you to heal at the end of combat, as well as boosting some cards.
